channel.title: S3 on Richard Standow
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on Richard Standow

item.title: Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: As I lack proof of cloud skills working for others, I put this project together to showcase my skills. You may ask “What is Cloud Resume Challenge”? let me use a bit of Prompt engineering and see what GPT3 says “As more and more businesses move to the cloud; they are looking for ways to leverage this new technology to improve their bottom line. One way they are doing this is by challenging their employees to create resumes that are stored in the cloud.

item.title: Resume and FAQ
item.description: FAQ you may have. Q: Where are you now? A: Until Nov 5th 2022 I currently reside in Hua Hin Thailand. After Nov 5th I plan on living in Portland Oregon USA. Q: Are you willing to relocate? A: Yes I am willing to relocate for the right job. Q: What kind of job are you looking for? A: Full time and it would be great if I could work remote and live in Hua Hin Thailand.
